change.changenote: Section 1 (1) definition of "person", paragraph (a) BEFORE amended by 2023-10-1045, effective March 30, 2023 (Royal Assent).

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: an individual, including an individual in his or her capacity as trustee, executor, administrator or other representative,

change.changenote: Section 6 (part) BEFORE amended by 2017-10-60,Sch 1, effective November 2, 2017 (Royal Assent).

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Principles of law and equity apply
bcl:section.bcl:text: Except in so far as they are inconsistent with this Act, the principles of law and equity supplement this Act and continue to apply, including
